Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Axillary Treatment in Breast Cancer Patients with Positive Sentinel Node Biopsy

Participants.evidence: patients with operable unifocal invasive breast cancer and clinically negative lymph nodes

Intervention.evidence: randomized to either ALND or ART

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the sentinel node identification rate, measured at the time of surgery.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomization was centralized and stratified by institution.

Result_Outcome.evidence: the sentinel node identification rate was 97% (1,888/1,953)
